translation.ja: すごく光ってる 絶対ママだよ

translation.en: -So beautiful. -Look at that shooting star over there.
translation.ja: あれ見て　流れ星だ

translation.en: -[kids] Whoa! -Everybody make a wish.
translation.ja: 願い事を

translation.en: And then back to bed.
translation.ja: おやすみ

translation.en: Whose wellies are they, Dad?
translation.ja: それ誰の？

translation.en: Well, I think they were my daddy's, but I'm not sure.
translation.ja: パパの父さんのかな　たぶん

translation.en: How come you don't know much about your dad?
translation.ja: なんで知らないの？

translation.en: Because my daddy was very busy,
translation.ja: 父さんは忙しくて

translation.en: and I didn't see him much at all when I was growing up, and then we lost contact.
translation.ja: 子供の頃 ほとんど会えず連絡も途絶えた

translation.en: I don't want to lose contact with you.
translation.ja: パパと離れたくない

translation.en: That will never ever happen, okay?
translation.ja: そんなこと絶対起きないよ

translation.en: -Never. -[kids yell]
translation.ja: サプライズ！

translation.en: [Matt] Oh, God! You've broke the bed!
translation.ja: ベッドが壊れた

translation.en: -[Matt] Kids, come in. Be careful. -Yay! The goat's back!
translation.ja: 気をつけて ヤギだ

translation.en: -[Lily] Yay! -Buster. What've we said about lollipops for breakfast, okay? Buster.
translation.ja: バスターアメはダメだって言ったよね

translation.en: Hey! He took my lolly!
translation.ja: アメを取られた

translation.en: Ugh, Buster!
translation.ja: バスター

translation.en: It's not me!
translation.ja: 僕じゃない

translation.en: -It is not Buster, okay? The eggs are bad. -Maybe the chicken laid an egg.
translation.ja: 今のは卵が悪い 鶏(ニワトリ)が産んだのかも

translation.en: Let's go and see!
translation.ja: 見に行こう

translation.en: -And there is no Wi-Fi. There is no Wi-Fi! -Daddy, why are you shouting?
translation.ja: Wi-Fiもないのか 叫ばないで

translation.en: Because there's no Wi-Fi!
translation.ja: Wi-Fiがない！

translation.en: -Any eggs? -We looked under every single chicken.
translation.ja: 卵は？ 全部の鶏を確認したけど何もない

translation.en: No eggs. Nothing.
translation.ja: 全部の鶏を確認したけど何もない

translation.en: -Thought there were gonna be more animals. -Yeah, maybe even like a baby Fleece.
translation.ja: 動物はどこ？ 羊の赤ちゃんもいない

translation.en: -[Rosie] What was that? Come on! -[Violet] Let's go see!
translation.ja: 今のは何だろう 早く見に行こう

translation.en: Tiny pony!
translation.ja: ポニーだ

translation.en: -[Lily] Real-life donkey. -[Buster] And a baby cow.
translation.ja: 本物のロバ 子牛も

translation.en: And a baby Fleece.
translation.ja: 赤ちゃん羊

translation.en: -Quick, hurry up, let's go. -[kid] Run!
translation.ja: マズい　急いで 逃げろ！

translation.en: It's an ogre.
translation.ja: 鬼だよ

translation.en: Who said that? Come out and show yourselves. How did you get in?
translation.ja: 姿を見せろどうやってここに入った？

translation.en: Through the door.
translation.ja: 扉から

translation.en: Oh, very clever. [grunts]
translation.ja: それは賢い

translation.en: Oh, who are you?
translation.ja: 誰だ

translation.en: -Well, do you have names? -Everyone has names, don't they?
translation.ja: 名前はあるか？ 誰でも名前はある

translation.en: Not necessarily, no. See that donkey?
translation.ja: あのロバを見ろ

translation.en: That's donkey number one, and that one is donkey number two.
translation.ja: ロバその１とロバその２

translation.en: -Why don't you name them? -Because I forgot to do it, okay?
translation.ja: 名前は？ つけ忘れた

translation.en: What are your names?
translation.ja: 名前は？

translation.en: I'm Violet.
translation.ja: ヴァイオレット

translation.en: I'm Rosie, the oldest.
translation.ja: ロージーよ

translation.en: -I'm Buster. -And I'm Lily, Charlie's twin.
translation.ja: バスター チャーリーと双子のリリー

translation.en: You don't look like twins.
translation.ja: 似てない

translation.en: [both] Because we're non-identical twins.
translation.ja: 二卵性双生児だから

translation.en: Right, okay, so what are you non-identicals doing on my farm?
translation.ja: それで俺の農場で何をしてる？

translation.en: -Our dad won it in a Willy Wonka thing. -What is a--
translation.ja: パパが賞品にもらったの

translation.en: He means a will. Dad got it from his father's will.
translation.ja: パパの父親からの遺産よ

translation.en: So you're the new owners?
translation.ja: 新しい農場主か

translation.en: Oh my God! Well, why didn't you say? [laughs]
translation.ja: 何だ　早く言ってくれよ

translation.en: Hello! Uh, I am Beano.
translation.ja: やあ 俺はビーノ

translation.en: Farmhand slash animal wrangler slash professional poo-picker-upper.
translation.ja: 農夫兼 家畜の世話係兼プロのうんち拾い

translation.en: Hashtag Beano at your service.
translation.ja: #ビーノにお任せを

translation.en: Pleased to meet you, guys.
translation.ja: お会いできて光栄です

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the animals? -[kids] Yes!
translation.ja: 動物に？ 会いたい

translation.en: [Beano] Yes, you do!
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Then walk this way.
translation.ja: こっちへどうぞ

translation.en: So this is my man pig, Arnie,
translation.ja: これはブタのアーニー

translation.en: named after his favorite actor, Arnold Schwarzenegger.
translation.ja: シュワちゃんのアーノルドからとった

translation.en: "I'll be back… bacon."
translation.ja: “アイル･ビー･ベーコン”

translation.en: No? Okay, and this beautiful, beautiful soul here is Potter.
translation.ja: まあいい この美しい子はポッター

translation.en: Very, very magical. Trained at Hogwarts.
translation.ja: ホグワーツで勉強したんだ

translation.en: And meet these little legends. Itsy.
translation.ja: これは小さな伝説 イッツィ

translation.en: Bitsy. Bitsy. Yeah. Oh!
translation.ja: ビッツィ

translation.en: Teenie. Teenie.
translation.ja: これはティーニー

translation.en: And, oh, this one is Weenie, but be careful about Weenie,
translation.ja: この子はウィニー 気をつけて

translation.en: 'cause she will "wee wee wee-nie" all the way home.
translation.ja: ずっと“ウィーウィー”鳴くからね

translation.en: Okay? Won't you, little one? Yes, you will.
translation.ja: そうだろ？

translation.en: See what I mean?
translation.ja: ほらね

translation.en: -[Beano] Wanna meet Jingle? -Yes.
translation.ja: ジングルに会う？

translation.en: -Ta-da! It's Jingle! -[kids] Aww!
translation.ja: ジャーン ジングルだ

translation.en: Why has he got bells around his neck?
translation.ja: 首に鈴がついてる

translation.en: So if he wanders off, we can hear him. He's only a baby sheep.
translation.ja: 迷子になった時聞こえるように

translation.en: -[lamb bleats] -Hello, Jingle!
translation.ja: こんにちは ジングル

translation.en: [all] Hello, Jingle!
translation.ja: こんにちは ジングル

translation.en: That's amazing! Hello, pleased to meet you.
translation.ja: 初めまして

translation.en: Hello, milady. Hello, sir.
translation.ja: どうぞよろしく

translation.en: Hello to you, and hello to you too.
translation.ja: どうも　こんにちは

translation.en: You look after Jingle, okay?
translation.ja: 世話をよろしく

translation.en: Now, these two little ladies, Mary and Bright, they speak incredible French.
translation.ja: メリーとブライトはフランス語が話せる

translation.en: -Ponies don't speak French. -[Beano] Excusez-moi!
translation.ja: ウソでしょ 〈どうも メリー ええブライト？〉

translation.en: Mary. Oui. Bright?
translation.ja: 〈どうも メリー ええブライト？〉

translation.en: Oui, oui! Au revoir.
translation.ja: 〈さよなら〉

translation.en: Au revoir.
translation.ja: 〈またね〉

translation.en: Oh, have you met Rudolph yet?
translation.ja: ルドルフは？

translation.en: As in the reindeer?
translation.ja: トナカイ？

translation.en: -Uh, no, as in Rudolph, the Great… -[dog barks]
translation.ja: 違う　ルドルフはグレート…

translation.en: Oh! …Dane!
translation.ja: デーンだ

translation.en: Oh. See them sheep there? They belong to the farm, and Rudolph here is gonna herd them.
translation.ja: ルドルフは羊たちを集めたり追ったりする

translation.en: So, is Rudolph a sheepdog, then?
translation.ja: 牧羊犬？

translation.en: Not really, no, but he's trying. Shall we give it a go?
translation.ja: まだだけど努力してる見てみる？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Right.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph. Herd these sheep, boy! Come on, boy!
translation.ja: さあ 羊を集めて

translation.en: Go on, Rudolph!
translation.ja: がんばれ

translation.en: ♪ Out of all the reindeers ♪ ♪ You know you're the mastermind… ♪
translation.ja: トナカイの中でも　　　　お前が一番だ

translation.en: [Beano] Good boy.
translation.ja: いい子だ

translation.en: ♪ Run, run, Rudolph… ♪ [Beano] Come on.
translation.ja: 走れ ルドルフ

translation.en: ♪ Randolph ain't too far behind… ♪
translation.ja: ランドルフが追ってる

translation.en: -[Beano] Come-bye! -[kids cheer]
translation.ja: 時計回りに

translation.en: ♪ Run, run… ♪
translation.ja: 走れ…

translation.en: Hi, kids. Where have you been?
translation.ja: どこに行ってたんだ？

translation.en: We've been talking to the animals with Beano.
translation.ja: 動物たちと話してた

translation.en: That sounds great.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Dad, can we go explore the farm some more?
translation.ja: もっと探検してもいい？

translation.en: -Okay. Yeah, sure. Let me just try this. -Beano will look after us.
translation.ja: これが終わったらな ビーノがいる

translation.en: Okay, no worries. I'll be there in five.
translation.ja: 心配ない　５分後に

translation.en: Wait, what? Beano? Who's… who's Beano?
translation.ja: 何だって ビーノって誰だ

translation.en: Right, that's… that's not gonna do it.
translation.ja: これじゃ武器にならない

translation.en: [grunts] I'm coming, kids!
translation.ja: 今 行くぞ

translation.en: Okay. Right, okay. Get back! You get back, okay? Stay back, kids!
translation.ja: 下がれ　子供たちは離れて

translation.en: Who… who are you?
translation.ja: 誰だ？

translation.en: Please don't shoot.
translation.ja: 撃つな

translation.en: He hasn't done anything wrong, Dad. He lives here.
translation.ja: いい人だよ　ここに住んでる

translation.en: -What do you mean? -He lives here. He's the farmhand.
translation.ja: 何だって ここに住んでる農夫よ

translation.en: And animal wangler.
translation.ja: 家畜のケア係

translation.en: -No, it's actually wrangler. -Why have you even got that, Dad?
translation.ja: 世話係だよ それ何なの

translation.en: Because I didn't know that Hagrid lived in the barn. Who are you?
translation.ja: 畜舎にハグリッドが住んでるとは

translation.en: Listen, I'm Beano. I live here. I've worked here my whole life.
translation.ja: 俺はビーノ　ここに住んでる

translation.en: I've been telling your non-identicals about the farm.
translation.ja: 二卵性双生児に農場の話をしてた

translation.en: Dad, come and meet donkey number one. He's the cutest donkey in the world!
translation.ja: ロバその１は世界一かわいいロバだよ

translation.en: Okay. Sorry. I just didn't…
translation.ja: そうか　すまない

translation.en: I'm sorry about… this. I don't think it works anyway.
translation.ja: 悪かった どうせ壊れてた

translation.en: [Buster] Dad, you scared Beano!
translation.ja: パパ ひどいよ

translation.en: -That was an accident. -[grunts] And you scared the animals.
translation.ja: 事故だ 動物も怖がってる

translation.en: Look at Mary! She's done a massive scared pony poo on the floor!
translation.ja: メリーを見て ビビってうんちを大量にもらした

translation.en: Say sorry to her.
translation.ja: ビビってうんちを大量にもらした

translation.en: -Sorry, Mary. -In French.
translation.ja: ごめん 仏語で

translation.en: -In? -French.
translation.ja: えっ？ フランス語

translation.en: [groans] Pardon, Mary. Il très, uh, nincompoop.
translation.ja: 〈ごめん メリー驚かしちゃったね〉

translation.en: So, you work here?
translation.ja: ここで仕事を？

translation.en: -Oui. -Do you know anything about plumbing?
translation.ja: 〈ああ〉 配管についてわかる？

translation.en: Ta-da!
translation.ja: ジャーン

translation.en: -Wow, he's magic. -Now, this is just a temporary fix, okay?
translation.ja: 魔法みたい 一時的な解決だ

translation.en: I have to take a proper look at your pipes.
translation.ja: 配管をよく見ないとね

translation.en: Okay, well, at least I can set up my workstation.
translation.ja: でもパソコンが設置できる

translation.en: -Workstation? -[Matt] Yeah.
translation.ja: パソコン？

translation.en: That's why I'm here, to work on a big pitch.
translation.ja: 集中してプレゼンを準備する

translation.en: -No distractions. -What about your farm work?
translation.ja: 集中してプレゼンを準備する 農作業は？

translation.en: -Isn't that what you do? -I am not the farmer. I am the farmhand.
translation.ja: 君がいるだろ 俺はただの農夫

translation.en: The previous owner, your father, loved this place.
translation.ja: あんたの父親は自ら作業してたよ

translation.en: -He was proper hands-on. -Was he?
translation.ja: あんたの父親は自ら作業してたよ 本当？

translation.en: [Beano] He was a local hero.
translation.ja: 地元の英雄だ

translation.en: He saved this place from the clutches of the bad people. They were gonna knock it down.
translation.ja: ここを壊そうとする悪者の手から救った

translation.en: These bad people, did they offer any money or anything?
translation.ja: 悪人たちはお金を払うって？

translation.en: What? Proper cash-a-rooney.
translation.ja: そりゃ大金さ

translation.en: Yeah, but he loved the animals and farm way too much to ever sell it.
translation.ja: 動物と農場を愛しすぎて売れなかった

translation.en: -He sounds awesome. -He was awesome.
translation.ja: いい人みたい いい人だ

translation.en: You have to admit this place is past its sell-by date.
translation.ja: ここは売るには古すぎる

translation.en: Nothing works. Even the hens don't work. Have you smelt the eggs? They stink!
translation.ja: 何もかもボロボロ卵だってくさい

translation.en: Yes, 'cause no one's been here. We've been waiting for you,
translation.ja: 誰もいなかったしあんたを待ってた

translation.en: and now you are here, you can help us save the farm.
translation.ja: こうして来たんだから一緒に農場を救おう

translation.en: [Matt] Get off me!
translation.ja: 放せ

translation.en: Can we save the farm, Daddy?
translation.ja: 農場を救える？

translation.en: Yeah, Dad, can we save the farm with Beano?
translation.ja: ビーノと救えるよね

translation.en: No, staying here was just a temporary thing,
translation.ja: いや　これは一時的な滞在だ

translation.en: and I'm gonna get on with some work.
translation.ja: パパは仕事しないと

translation.en: We need to persuade your dad that this farm is way more important
translation.ja: バカなプレゼンより農場が大事だと説得しよう

translation.en: than his silly little pitch. Who's with me?
translation.ja: バカなプレゼンより農場が大事だと説得しよう やるか？

translation.en: -Yes! -Yeah!
translation.ja: やろう

translation.en: Okay. Walk this way.
translation.ja: じゃあ こっちへ

translation.en: Dad, you know Mummy would've wanted you to help us save the farm.
translation.ja: ママなら農場を助けると思う

translation.en: You saw how twinkly she was last night.
translation.ja: ゆうべキラキラしてたでしょ

translation.en: Okay, I tell you what, I will give you an hour tomorrow morning,
translation.ja: 明日の朝 １時間だけやる

translation.en: and you can show me how this whole farm works.
translation.ja: 農場を見せてくれ

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: Well done, Mr. C.
translation.ja: やったね

translation.en: [Beano] Hello!
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: Cock-a-doodle-doo! This is your 5 a.m. wake-up call.
translation.ja: 朝５時のモーニングコールだ

translation.en: Come on, sleepyhead.
translation.ja: 急いで

translation.en: -5 a.m.? It's the middle of the night. -Excuse me! Cows don't wait.
translation.ja: 夜中じゃないか 牛は待ってくれない

translation.en: They've got to be milked, ready or not, and you've got to pick up their poop.
translation.ja: 乳しぼりをしてうんちを拾わないと

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: さあ

translation.en: Why have I got to do this job? It's awful.
translation.ja: なぜ僕がこんな作業を？

translation.en: Cows' poop are like golden nuggets. Fertilizes the grass, helps it grow.
translation.ja: 牛のうんちは金塊だ 牧草の肥料になる

translation.en: We love the poop. We worship the poop.
translation.ja: うんちを愛しうんちを崇拝せよ

translation.en: How much wood could a woodchuck chuck if a woodchuck could chuck wood?
translation.ja: キツツキ木突き中木に頭突き気絶中

translation.en: Hey, you remind me of someone. Have you seen the film The Shining?
translation.ja: 誰かに似てるな「シャイニング」見た？

translation.en: Here's Beano!
translation.ja: “ビーノ登場だ”

translation.en: Let's chop some wood.
translation.ja: 薪(まき)割りだ

translation.en: You need to put your back into it, Farmer Cunningham. Swing it really high.
translation.ja: 腰を入れて農家のカニンガムさん

translation.en: Yeah? Try…
translation.ja: わかった

translation.en: -Pretend I'm a big voluptuous pig. -Yeah.
translation.ja: 俺を太ったブタだと思って

translation.en: [Beano] Litter. Floor. Pig. Litter.
translation.ja: 床にゴミが落ちてるぞ

translation.en: Ooh! Lollipop!
translation.ja: “わあ　アメだ”

translation.en: Dangerous. Put your litter in the bin.
translation.ja: 危険だゴミはゴミ箱に入れる

translation.en: But most importantly, never ever leave that gate to the far field open,
translation.ja: 一番大事なのはゲートを開け放しにしない

translation.en: 'cause if that gate is left open, the animals will escape.
translation.ja: 開いてると動物が逃げる

translation.en: If they escape, they will get hurt, and if they get hurt, you will get hurt.
translation.ja: 逃げると動物が傷つき人間にケガをさせる

translation.en: -Do you wanna meet the cows? -Yeah!
translation.ja: 牛に会う？ 会いたいな　では行こう

translation.en: -Yes, you do! Come on. Let's go. -[Matt] Oh.
translation.ja: 会いたいな　では行こう

translation.en: We've got Matilda, Patty, Harry, Hermione, Miss Trunchbull.
translation.ja: マチルダ パティ ハリートランチブル校長

translation.en: A cow called Miss Trunchbull?
translation.ja: 校長先生？

translation.en: Oh, yes. Nanny McPhee and Susan Boyle.
translation.ja: ナニー･マクフィーとスーザン･ボイルもね

translation.en: -[cow moos] -How many sheep do you have?
translation.ja: 羊は何頭いる？

translation.en: Every time I count them, I fall to sleep, so I never get to the end.
translation.ja: 数えようとすると寝ちゃうんだ

translation.en: -What do you get paid for doing all this? -All this?
translation.ja: 給料はいくら？ 畜舎にただで住み育てた作物を食べる

translation.en: I get to live in the barn for free and eat all the produce that we grow,
translation.ja: 畜舎にただで住み育てた作物を食べる

translation.en: and I mean everything, and you give me money for sweets.
translation.ja: おやつ分のお金もね

translation.en: Obviously, you have to pay for other things, like the vet.
translation.ja: あとは獣医に払う代金

translation.en: -The vet? -[Beano] The vet.
translation.ja: 獣医？ 動物の診察をする

translation.en: -Someone that looks after animals. -I know.
translation.ja: 動物の診察をする 知ってる

translation.en: Why do you pay for a vet? It's a waste of money.
translation.ja: 獣医に払うカネはムダだろ

translation.en: They're like dentists. Always add a bit extra. A rip-off.
translation.ja: 歯医者と同じでぼったくりだ

translation.en: -Do you know him? Can you trust him? -I'm a "her" actually.
translation.ja: 信頼できる男か 女だし ぼったくらない

translation.en: And I don't rip anyone off.
translation.ja: 女だし ぼったくらない

translation.en: -You're the horse lady. -And you're the road hog.
translation.ja: 馬の女性か 迷惑な運転者

translation.en: -I won't be staying long, don't worry. -[vet] That's a shame.
translation.ja: すぐ帰るよ 残念ね

translation.en: I baked these, but seeing as you're not staying…
translation.ja: これを焼いたけどもう帰るなら…

translation.en: Give 'em to me!
translation.ja: 俺にくれ

translation.en: Sorry, I just love Miss Ashley's cookies.
translation.ja: 大好きなんだチョコチップ？

translation.en: -Chocolate chip? -Triple chocolate chip.
translation.ja: 大好きなんだチョコチップ？ そうよ

translation.en: Triple chocolate chip! Arnie! Look what Daddy's got for you.
translation.ja: チョコチップ！アーニー 食べよう

translation.en: I take it you're acquainted with all the animals here, then?
translation.ja: ここにいる動物は全部知ってる？

translation.en: [Matt] I mean, I'm not really an animal person.
translation.ja: 動物には詳しくない

translation.en: Well, that's a shame. Mistletoe Farm has some wonderful livestock.
translation.ja: 残念ね ここにはすばらしい家畜がいるし

translation.en: -And you're about to get a new addition. -Huh?
translation.ja: また増える

translation.en: -Holly's about to pop. -What?
translation.ja: ホリーがママに えっ？

translation.en: She's pregnant.
translation.ja: 妊娠してる

translation.en: You're kidding! [laughs]
translation.ja: マジか

translation.en: You're kidding. No, 'cause a kid is a baby goat. It doesn't matter.
translation.ja: ヤギだけにメエでたいまあいいか

translation.en: You should prepare yourself because goats often have twins, sometimes triplets.
translation.ja: ヤギは双子や三つ子を産むことも珍しくない

translation.en: -Triplets? -[piglet squeals]
translation.ja: 三つ子？

translation.en: Oh, hello, Mr. Weenie! How are you today?
translation.ja: ウィニーさん 調子はどう？

translation.en: Hello, Ashley. Thank you for the cookies. I love you.
translation.ja: アシュリークッキーありがとう

translation.en: -Oh, it's okay! -Wee, wee, wee.
translation.ja: いいの　プレゼントよ

translation.en: -It's a present! -Okay. That's… weird.
translation.ja: いいの　プレゼントよ いい加減にしてくれ

translation.en: Listen, it was nice to meet you for a second time.
translation.ja: 一瞬だけど会えてよかった

translation.en: Hopefully I don't have to see you again. Oh, no. I just mean the animals are fine.
translation.ja: もう会いたくない 動物が元気ならってことだ

translation.en: I come and check up on them every week.
translation.ja: 毎週 診察に来る

translation.en: And if Holly Goat's waters break, give me a call at the surgery.
translation.ja: ホリーが破水したら私の動物病院に電話して

translation.en: I think we've got it covered.
translation.ja: 必要ない

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.ja: そう

translation.en: Ooh. I think there's something brewing, Weenie.
translation.ja: 何かが起こりそうだな

translation.en: -Dad, who was that? -That was the vet.
translation.ja: あれ誰？ 獣医さん

translation.en: She's really pretty.
translation.ja: きれいな人

translation.en: She's really expensive is what she is, Rosie,
translation.ja: 彼女は高くつく人だ

translation.en: and apparently we're having kids, maybe three.
translation.ja: 子供が生まれるらしい

translation.en: But you've just met.
translation.ja: 今 会ったのに

translation.en: No, not me and Miss Ashley. The Holly jolly goat.
translation.ja: 違う　ヤギのホリーのことだ

translation.en: Mr. Cunningham, I've give Weenie too many cookies.
translation.ja: クッキーを食べさせすぎた

translation.en: There's poop everywhere. Take her. I need to clean it.
translation.ja: うんちだらけだ掃除しないと

translation.en: But I can't… Uh…
translation.ja: 僕は…

translation.en: -Beano! Beano! -[kids laugh]
translation.ja: ビーノ　ビーノ！

translation.en: Oh, I'm glad you're back.
translation.ja: よかった

translation.en: We've got a cat, two budgies, a parakeet, a ferret, a rabbit, and Oscar the pig.
translation.ja: 猫と２匹の犬 インコフェレットとウサギと… ブタのオスカーが

translation.en: Seems to have eaten something that he shouldn't have again.
translation.ja: また何か食べたみたい

translation.en: -So, how did it go over at Mistletoe? -I met the new owner, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.ja: ヤドリギ農場は？ 農場主に会った

translation.en: -Ooh, what's he like? -To be honest, he's a bit…
translation.ja: どう？ 彼は…

translation.en: -Couldn't put it better myself. -[woman laughs]
translation.ja: あんな感じ

translation.en: What's Oscar been up to this time?
translation.ja: 今度は何をしたの？

translation.en: He's eaten my dad's underpants again.
translation.ja: パパのパンツを食べた

translation.en: -[Beano] Mr. Cunningham! -Oh God!
translation.ja: 失礼 驚かすなよ

translation.en: -You nearly gave me a heart attack! -Sorry.
translation.ja: 驚かすなよ ごめん

translation.en: Me and the kids have come up with a roster of farm chores, and we put you in charge of Christmas!
translation.ja: 子供たちと作業表をあんたはクリスマス担当だ

translation.en: Yep. You've got to fix the barn up for the Hoedown Snowdown!
translation.ja: ホーダウン向けに畜舎の修理を 何だと？

translation.en: -The what? -Happens every Christmas at the barn. We snow the place down. There's mulled wine and barn dancing, cowboy.
translation.ja: 毎年 畜舎を雪でおおいワインを飲みながら踊る

translation.en: Wait, no. It will not be happening this year.
translation.ja: 今年は やらない

translation.en: I need to do a pitch on Christmas Eve, and I need quiet.
translation.ja: イブにプレゼンするんだ

translation.en: No, this will not do.
translation.ja: それは ありえない

translation.en: You have got to find a way to get Christmas into this barn.
translation.ja: 畜舎にクリスマスを呼び込まないと

translation.en: Your father would be very disappointed.
translation.ja: 父上が失望する

translation.en: Listen, you can have your Snowdown Hoedown if you like, but you're not gonna have it on my farm.
translation.ja: ホーダウンでも何でもいいがこの農場ではやらないからな

translation.en: Oh, boy, does your dad get angry.
translation.ja: 君らのパパは怒ってる

translation.en: I don't think he likes Christmas anymore. He even made me leave the Christmas tree at home.
translation.ja: クリスマスが嫌いなのツリーを家から出した

translation.en: We need help, guys, and I know exactly who we need.
translation.ja: 助けが必要だ　考えがある

translation.en: We need to get your dad into the village to meet the village people.
translation.ja: 村人たちにパパを会わせよう

translation.en: -Yes! -Ooh.
translation.ja: うん

translation.en: This, guys, is Cobbledon.
translation.ja: ここがコブルドンだ

translation.en: Post Office. Letters to Santa go there, okay, guys?
translation.ja: 郵便局だよサンタへの手紙を出す

translation.en: And now I'm gonna take ya to the Cobbledon Arms.
translation.ja: 次はコブルドン･アームズだ

translation.en: Come on, we're clearly not welcome here.
translation.ja: 歓迎されてないようだ

translation.en: -What's all this? -It's for you!
translation.ja: 何だ 歓迎会だよ

translation.en: Beano told us you've come to save Mistletoe Farm.
translation.ja: ヤドリギ農場を救いに来たのよね

translation.en: You're our hero!
translation.ja: 私たちのヒーローよ

translation.en: Come in, come in, let's meet everyone.
translation.ja: みんなを紹介するわ

translation.en: This is Perky, the landlord.
translation.ja: 店主のパーキーよ

translation.en: Pleasure to meet you, son of Cunningham. Hey, first one's on me.
translation.ja: 息子さんか１杯目は店のおごりだ

translation.en: This is Ted the butcher, Barry the baker, and Merrick.
translation.ja: 精肉店のテッドとパン焼きバリー メリック

translation.en: Let me guess, the candlestick maker?
translation.ja: ロウソク職人とか？

translation.en: -How'd you know? -I was joking.
translation.ja: 正解よ 冗談だ

translation.en: He does! He makes candles.
translation.ja: ロウソクを作ってる

translation.en: I'm Otto, the builder. Anything you need fixing, I'm your man.
translation.ja: 大工のオットー何でも直すよ

translation.en: And I'm Barney, the postman.
translation.ja: 郵便配達のバーニーだ

translation.en: I delivered the inheritance. Told you you'd like it.
translation.ja: 荷物を配達しただろ

translation.en: -And I'm the town crier! -Hello.
translation.ja: 私はお触れ役だ ええ

translation.en: If you pop your head round here, you'll see Happy, Sneezy, Dopey,
translation.ja: ハッピー スニーズィードーピー

translation.en: and this bundle of joy, Grumpy. It's what they played in panto last year. They were typecast.
translation.ja: グランピーは去年クリスマスの芝居に出たんだ

translation.en: My name's Gerald Favor. I'm the director of the Cobbledon Players.
translation.ja: コブルドン劇団の演出家ジェラルド

translation.en: Did I ever tell you all about that time I did The Mousetrap?
translation.ja: 「ねずみとり」公演の話は？

translation.en: [all] Yes!
translation.ja: 聞いてる

translation.en: And one of my favorites, Miss Bow.
translation.ja: 俺の好きなボーさん

translation.en: Only because I own the sweet shop.
translation.ja: 菓子店を経営してるからよ

translation.en: Who are these little mites?
translation.ja: 子供たちは？

translation.en: We have Master Buster, Miss Violet, Miss Rosie, and the twins.
translation.ja: バスター ヴァイオレットロージーと双子

translation.en: They don't look like twins.
translation.ja: 似てないけど

translation.en: -[both] They're non-identical. -Ah.
translation.ja: 二卵性だから

translation.en: -They're mine. -Where's your mummy?
translation.ja: 僕の子たち ママは？

translation.en: She died.
translation.ja: 死んだ

translation.en: -Oh… -Uh, here, have some sweets.
translation.ja: お菓子をどうぞ

translation.en: And I knitted you some novelties. Perhaps you'd like to choose one each.
translation.ja: マスコットを編んだの１つずつあげる

translation.en: -Thank you. -Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: Hi, I'm Miss Nerris.
translation.ja: 私はノリス

translation.en: Cobbledon Village School. Are these the children joining my class?
translation.ja: 学校の先生ようちのクラスに来るのね

translation.en: I'm excited about getting them to hang out with children their age.
translation.ja: ええ 同年代の子たちと交流させたい

translation.en: There's only two children in my class.
translation.ja: 生徒は２人だけよ

translation.en: There's only two children in the whole school, actually.
translation.ja: 学校全体で２人

translation.en: You see, we're a very small village with a teeny tiny population.
translation.ja: 人口がすごく少ない小さな村だから

translation.en: Forty-seven. Twenty-nine letterboxes.
translation.ja: 47人　29世帯

translation.en: Fine, as long as they do educational activities.
translation.ja: ちゃんと勉強するならいい

translation.en: Of course. -If I can think of any. -[laughter]
translation.ja: もちろん　思いつく時は

translation.en: What I mean is education comes in many forms.
translation.ja: 教育にはいろいろな形がある

translation.en: Does it?
translation.ja: そう？

translation.en: -Yeah. -That is true.
translation.ja: ええ　その通り

translation.en: Do you like singing?
translation.ja: 歌は好き？

translation.en: -Do you? -You're welcome to join the choir.
translation.ja: 聖歌隊に参加してね

translation.en: Hi, I'm Abel. I organize the welly throwing.
translation.ja: エイベルブーツ投げの担当

translation.en: I'm Aaron, head bell ringer. We practice on a Monday if you're free.
translation.ja: アーロンハンドベルの練習は月曜だ

translation.en: I'm Miss Verity. I run the village bookshop and library.
translation.ja: ヴェリティよ書店と図書館担当

translation.en: Pop in any time for a book and a biscuit.
translation.ja: いつでも来てね

translation.en: By the way, my name's Miss Womble,
translation.ja: 私はウォンブルよ

translation.en: and I've created the knitting circle,
translation.ja: 編み物サークルを作って

translation.en: and I knit all the jumpers that you can see here,
translation.ja: このセーターを全部編んだ

translation.en: every single one of them, and the hats,
translation.ja: 全員分　帽子もね

translation.en: and we'd be delighted if you'd like to all join in,
translation.ja: ぜひとも参加して

translation.en: and we'd especially like you to join, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.ja: カニンガムさんは特に歓迎よ

translation.en: If you don't know how to knit, we could knit you a jumper.
translation.ja: あなたのセーターを編んであげる

translation.en: We could knit your face onto it if you like.
translation.ja: あなたの似顔絵入りのね

translation.en: What do you think?
translation.ja: どう思う？

translation.en: -He's handsome, isn't he? -Yes.
translation.ja: 彼ってハンサムね

translation.en: Listen, I'm not really into all this community stuff.
translation.ja: 寄り合いに興味はない

translation.en: We were gonna ask you to be the president of the Christmas Association.
translation.ja: クリスマス協会長を頼もうと思ったのに

translation.en: Your father always cut down the biggest Christmas tree and donated it to the village square.
translation.ja: お父上は一番大きなツリーを広場に寄付してた

translation.en: We don't have a Christmas tree at the house.
translation.ja: 家にツリーがないの

translation.en: -Not even any Christmas lights. -No Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.ja: ライトもない クリスマスがないの？

translation.en: Well, we'll have to see what we can do about that, won't we?
translation.ja: みんなで何とかしないと

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.ja: もちろん

translation.en: Uh, who fancies a Cobbledon Soda? Yeah. You take a seat. Come on.
translation.ja: ジュース飲む？ さあ　座って

translation.en: -[Matt exhales] -How's Holly Goat?
translation.ja: ホリーは？

translation.en: Um, I haven't checked on her. I don't know.
translation.ja: 見てないから わからない

translation.en: You haven't checked on your pregnant goat?
translation.ja: 妊娠したヤギを放置？

translation.en: Well… No, I'm sure she'll be fine.
translation.ja: きっと 大丈夫さ

translation.en: -I'll check when I get back. -[whimsical music plays]
translation.ja: 帰ったら見るよ
5000？　そんなはず…

translation.en: 5,000, and he hasn't paid… Have you paid for anything?
translation.ja: 5000ポンドも未払い金が？

translation.en: Sweets. Sweets? £68 on sweets.
translation.ja: お菓子が68ポンドだって？

translation.en: It can't be.
translation.ja: バカな

translation.en: Is it saying "Matt"?
translation.ja: “マット”？

translation.en: -Hey, Holly. How you doing? -[Holly bleats]
translation.ja: ホリー 調子は？

translation.en: Are you a bit anxious?
translation.ja: 心配か？

translation.en: My wife was scared when she had our first baby.
translation.ja: 初めての出産で妻は怖がった

translation.en: I mean, not as scared as me. I was terrified about being a dad.
translation.ja: いい父親になれるかわからなくて僕は―

translation.en: Didn't know if I'd be any good.
translation.ja: もっと怖かった

translation.en: Nice to see you talking to the animals, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.ja: 動物に話しかけるとはいい心がけだ

translation.en: You know, they understand everything we say, and we can understand every bleat, moo, bark, oink, if we truly listen.
translation.ja: ちゃんと耳を傾けさえすればお互いに意思の疎通は可能さ

translation.en: Well, I have listened, understood, and now I'm leaving.
translation.ja: 耳を傾けたし理解したもう帰る

translation.en: Mr. C, when you were talking to Holly about not being a good enough dad…
translation.ja: 話を聞いたけど あんたはきっといい父親になれる

translation.en: -I think you're going to be a great dad. -"Going to be"?
translation.ja: あんたはきっといい父親になれる “きっと”？

translation.en: Me and your popsicle, we were close. He let me call him grandpops because he knew he missed out on his own kid and grandkids.
translation.ja: あんたのパパは俺にじいさんと呼ばせてくれた

translation.en: I don't want you missing out too.
translation.ja: 孫の代わりさ

translation.en: I am nothing like my "popsicle," okay?
translation.ja: 僕は“パパ”とは違う

translation.en: I don't think you should be sticking your nose into my family.
translation.ja: 僕の家のことに首を突っ込むな

translation.en: We're family too!
translation.ja: でも家族だろ

translation.en: How?
translation.ja: なんで？

translation.en: If your popsicle was my grandpops, then you are more or less my dad.
translation.ja: あんたのパパが俺のじいさんだから

translation.en: What are you talking about?
translation.ja: 何を言ってる

translation.en: You're a fully grown man, and you are definitely not my family.
translation.ja: 君は大人だし断じて僕の家族じゃない

translation.en: -Did you put that step there? -No.
translation.ja: 君が？ いや

translation.en: -Night, Dad. -[sad music plays]
translation.ja: おやすみ 父さん

translation.en: You literally took the words right out of my mouth.
translation.ja: 俺が言いたかったよ

translation.en: Hey, Buster, what's up?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: -I had a bad dream. -Oh, buddy, come here.
translation.ja: 怖い夢を見たの おいで

translation.en: You know bad dreams aren't real.
translation.ja: 夢は現実じゃない

translation.en: Do we have to go to school tomorrow?
translation.ja: 明日学校に行かなきゃダメ？

translation.en: School is meant to be fun.
translation.ja: 学校は楽しいぞ

translation.en: But the children might laugh at me.
translation.ja: みんなに笑われる

translation.en: -Why would anybody laugh at you? -Because I wear sparkly things.
translation.ja: なんでだ？ キラキラを着るから

translation.en: You know, Buster, there's absolutely nothing wrong with wearing sparkly things. Anyone can wear sparkles.
translation.ja: 誰がキラキラを着てもおかしいなんてことはない

translation.en: Even Fleece?
translation.ja: 羊も？

translation.en: Definitely Fleece.
translation.ja: 羊もだ

translation.en: Even Mary and Bright?
translation.ja: ポニーは？

translation.en: Yes, ponies love sparkles.
translation.ja: キラキラが大好きだ

translation.en: Even you?
translation.ja: パパも？

translation.en: Well, I'm not exactly a sparkly kind of person,
translation.ja: パパはそうでもないが

translation.en: but your mum, she used to love anything with glitter and sequins.
translation.ja: ママはスパンコールとかキラキラが大好きだった

translation.en: Did she wear a princess crown?
translation.ja: 王冠をかぶった？

translation.en: I bet she did when she was your age.
translation.ja: お前ぐらいの頃はね

translation.en: -Shall we go to bed? -Yeah.
translation.ja: もう寝られるか？

translation.en: Come on, then.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: Mary and Bright fed and exercised?
translation.ja: ポニーのエサと運動

translation.en: -Check! -Check.
translation.ja: やったよ

translation.en: -Cows and goats milked? -[both] Check.
translation.ja: 乳しぼり やった

translation.en: Pigs and piglets cleaned?
translation.ja: ブタの掃除

translation.en: -Double check. -Double check-a-rooney.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 バッチリだね

translation.en: Next job, school.
translation.ja: 次は学校だ

translation.en: We don't wanna go to school.
translation.ja: 学校に行きたくない

translation.en: -We wanna stay on the farm with you. -I don't think your dad would like that.
translation.ja: 一緒に農場にいたい パパは怒るよ

translation.en: -How are we gonna get to school anyway? -Yeah, Dad always gives us a lift.
translation.ja: どうやって行くの？ いつもは車で

translation.en: Ta-da.
translation.ja: ジャーン

translation.en: -[Buster] What are they? -Bicycles.
translation.ja: あれ何？ 自転車だ

translation.en: -[Buster] I don't know how to ride. -You don't know how to ride a bike?
translation.ja: 乗れない 乗れない？

translation.en: Well, then, you're gonna have to learn. First bikes, then tractors.
translation.ja: じゃあ練習だ まず自転車 次はトラクター

translation.en: Get your right leg, put it over the bike.
translation.ja: 右足で立って自転車をまたぐ

translation.en: Look forward, okay? No wobbling.
translation.ja: ぐらつかないように

translation.en: These are your brakes.
translation.ja: これがブレーキ

translation.en: Okay, guys? Very straight. Focus. Let's go.
translation.ja: いいか　まっすぐ行くよ

translation.en: Second one, go.
translation.ja: 次の子だ

translation.en: Let's go, go, go! Yes, buddy.
translation.ja: さあ 次も そうだ　ペダルを踏んで

translation.en: Feet on the pedals. Yes! You've got it!
translation.ja: そうだ　ペダルを踏んで 乗れた

translation.en: Yes!
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: -Have you seen the kids? -They've gone to school.
translation.ja: 子供らは？ 学校へ

translation.en: -What? How? -On their bikes. Like I did.
translation.ja: 何で 自転車　俺と同じ

translation.en: You went to school?
translation.ja: 君は？

translation.en: Yeah. I went to farm school.
translation.ja: 農場学校を出た

translation.en: -Is that even a thing? -Uh, yes.
translation.ja: 実在する？ ええ

translation.en: Are you sure they're gonna be okay just biking off?
translation.ja: 自転車で大丈夫？道も知らないのに

translation.en: -They don't know the area. -They'll be fine.
translation.ja: 自転車で大丈夫？道も知らないのに 大丈夫だよ

translation.en: -Where's the school? -In the village.
translation.ja: 学校は？ 村よ

translation.en: -Where's the village? -I don't know.
translation.ja: 村は？ さあ

translation.en: -[Buster] We're lost. -[Violet] It's okay, Buster.
translation.ja: 迷子だ イヤだよ 大丈夫よ

translation.en: [Charlie] I'm getting the wobbles again!
translation.ja: また不安になった

translation.en: Dad says to always stay where we are until someone finds us.
translation.ja: 誰かに会うまでじっとしてよう

translation.en: There's no one here though.
translation.ja: 誰もいない

translation.en: Yes, there is. Look!
translation.ja: いるよ　見て

translation.en: [all] Yoo-hoo! Hello!
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Hello, young 'uns.
translation.ja: おはよう

translation.en: We're late for school.
translation.ja: 遅刻しちゃう

translation.en: The school's only up the road. Come on.
translation.ja: 学校はすぐそこよ　おいで

translation.en: Is there really no Christmas on Mistletoe Farm?
translation.ja: 農場にクリスマスがない？

translation.en: Nope, no Christmas.
translation.ja: そうなの

translation.en: We're gonna have to help your father bring back Christmas traditions.
translation.ja: 伝統を取り戻す手伝いをするよ

translation.en: [Perky] And this is your new school.
translation.ja: ここが君らの新しい学校だ ここが君らの新しい学校だ 〝村の学校〞 ここが君らの新しい学校だ

translation.en: There you are, children! Don't worry, I've only just got here.
translation.ja: 着いたのね先生も来たばかりよ

translation.en: Kayla and Kayan are dying to meet you.
translation.ja: ケイラとカイエンが待ってる自転車を置いて

translation.en: Pop your bikes on the floor. Thank you so much.
translation.ja: ケイラとカイエンが待ってる自転車を置いて どうも

translation.en: -In you go. -Break a leg!
translation.ja: 入って がんばれよ

translation.en: Right, come on then. In you go. Sit down at the table.
translation.ja: さあ　入って 席に着いて

translation.en: Right, then.
translation.ja: 始めよう

translation.en: So now we have a big, huge class, we can do so many things.
translation.ja: クラスの人数が増えたから何でもできるね

translation.en: We can… make a school choir or put on a big Christmas play.
translation.ja: 聖歌隊も作れるし降誕劇だってできる

translation.en: -Yes! -Yes!
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: What else do you wanna do?
translation.ja: 何をしたい？

translation.en: -We don't really like school. -Especially our old school.
translation.ja: 学校は嫌いなの 前行ってた学校は特に

translation.en: Why not?
translation.ja: どうして？

translation.en: I had a lot of friends, but when Mum died, I got sad, and they called me boring.
translation.ja: ママが死んだ後悲しんでたら退屈と言われた

translation.en: -Oh gosh, that's terrible, isn't it? -[Kayla and Kayan] Yeah.
translation.ja: それは ひどいよね うん

translation.en: -What about you, Violet? -I get scared.
translation.ja: あなたは？ 特別なことがなくても時々怖くて不安になるの

translation.en: Not about anything special. I just get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.ja: 特別なことがなくても時々怖くて不安になるの

translation.en: That's all right. We all get the wobbles sometimes.
translation.ja: 誰だって不安になるよ

translation.en: Kids used to laugh at me because I wear sparkles.
translation.ja: キラキラを着ると笑われる

translation.en: We love sparkles here, don't we?
translation.ja: キラキラは大好きよ

translation.en: -Yeah, they're pretty. -And they're cool.
translation.ja: キレイ カッコいいよ

translation.en: How about we decorate the school Christmas tree? -Yes! -[Miss Nerris] Make it sparkly.
translation.ja: 学校のツリーを飾ってキラキラさせる？

translation.en: Come on, then. Follow me.
translation.ja: じゃあ ついてきて

translation.en: That's it. Pop your decorations on.
translation.ja: そう　飾りつけて

translation.en: -Where'd you get that star, Violet? -I made it for my mum at nursery.
translation.ja: その星は？ ママのため作った

translation.en: We put it on the tree every year, but there's not a tree at the farmhouse.
translation.ja: でも農場のおうちにはツリーがないの

translation.en: Well, Miss Nerris, maybe we can lend them our tree this year. We don't mind.
translation.ja: 先生 私たちのツリーを貸してあげよう

translation.en: I don't think your dad would like it.
translation.ja: パパが怒らない？

translation.en: I think our dad would be so busy working, he wouldn't even notice.
translation.ja: パパは忙しいから気づかない

translation.en: Really? Well, that's perfect.
translation.ja: そう？　ならよかった

translation.en: We'll take the tree to the farmhouse, and he won't even know we've been.
translation.ja: おうちにツリーを持っていきましょう

translation.en: Global? Global, global. Global.
translation.ja: グローバル…

translation.en: -Marketing. Advantages. -[knocking on door]
translation.ja: 市場開拓 優位性

translation.en: Merry Crimble!
translation.ja: おめでとう

translation.en: Festive gifts and Womble's knits!
translation.ja: ギフトと編み物よ

translation.en: -It's Christmas! -Ho-ho-ho!
translation.ja: クリスマスだ ホーホーホー

translation.en: -Sorry, what? -Where would you like us to start?
translation.ja: 失礼？ どこから？

translation.en: -[Matt] Start? -We've got to start on the decorations.
translation.ja: どこ？ 飾り付けからだ そうか

translation.en: -Okay. -No, we'll dress the set.
translation.ja: 飾り付けるよ　おいで

translation.en: -Come on, Dame Judi. -See you later.
translation.ja: 飾り付けるよ　おいで また後で

translation.en: Oh, Merry Christmas, Mr. Cunningham!
translation.ja: メリークリスマス

translation.en: Okay, listen, everyone. Sorry, can I get your attention?
translation.ja: 皆さん 頼む 聞いてくれ

translation.en: I really do appreciate the community spirit. I do, okay?
translation.ja: 村人の親切心はわかったけど

translation.en: But is there not a time that is more convenient?
translation.ja: もっと都合のいい時に来て

translation.en: Christmas won't wait for convenience.
translation.ja: クリスマスはすぐだ

translation.en: The Hoedown Snowdown will not stage itself.
translation.ja: ホーダウン･スノーダウンもある

translation.en: We are not having the Hoedown Snowdown this year. Not here, not now.
translation.ja: 今年はホーダウン･スノーダウンはしない

translation.en: Okay? So if everyone can just…
translation.ja: お引き取りを

translation.en: Thank you so much. It's great, but if you can…
translation.ja: 気持ちには感謝するけど

translation.en: That's it, take your hammer. Off you go. Very good. Thank you.
translation.ja: 金づちは持って帰ってどうも

translation.en: All the best. Thank you.
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: They're only trying to bring Christmas spirit.
translation.ja: クリスマス精神だよ

translation.en: I don't need Christmas spirit. I need peace and quiet.

translation.en: No. No. Out! Fine, no. Tell you what. Stay. Make yourself a sandwich.
translation.ja: ダメだ　出ていけ もういいサンドイッチでも作って

translation.en: Make yourself at home.
translation.ja: もういいサンドイッチでも作って

translation.en: -Get out of my way. -[donkey brays]
translation.ja: どいてくれ

translation.en: Don't worry, donkey number two. He's just a silly old Grinch.

translation.en: [laughs] I know. -Who wears a tie at a farm? -[knocking]

translation.en: Ho-ho-ho. I've got a delivery for you.
translation.ja: ホーホーホー 配達だ

translation.en: -What delivery? -Christmas cards from the villagers.
translation.ja: 配達？ 村人からのカードだ

translation.en: A lovely one from Miss Womble. Hand-knitted, impressive. Two lines of poetry in it.
translation.ja: ウォンブルの手編みのカードには詩が２行

translation.en: -Sorry, are you reading my post? -Only for health and safety.
translation.ja: 読んだのか？ 健康と安全のため

translation.en: Shall I take yours to the sorting office now?
translation.ja: 返事を持っていこうか？

translation.en: It's Womble, L-E. Not E-L.
translation.ja: ウォンブルのつづりが違う

translation.en: You might wanna put a kiss on each card. We usually do, just to be friendly.
translation.ja: キスの印にＸを書いたら？

translation.en: I'm not putting a kiss.
translation.ja: 書かない

translation.en: And talking of Christmas cards, your father used to be so popular,
translation.ja: お父上は人気者だったから壁に―

translation.en: he had hundreds of cards up here round on the walls.
translation.ja: 何百枚もカードを張り巡らしてた

translation.en: And generous!
translation.ja: 気前もいい

translation.en: He used to put a £10 note in each card with a little note saying, "Have a Cobbledon Brew on me."
translation.ja: カードに10ポンド紙幣を貼り地ビールを飲めって書いてた

translation.en: Did he? Good for him. Right. That's the last one.
translation.ja: そうか　これで最後だ

translation.en: And you need to go.
translation.ja: もう帰って

translation.en: I have a very important virtual meeting with a friend of mine starting very soon.
translation.ja: 友達とのビデオ会議がもうすぐ始まる

translation.en: [Barney] All right.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: We have real friends round here, Mr. Cunningham, not virtual ones.
translation.ja: ここには生身の友達がいるんだけどな

translation.en: Virtual friends, I don't know!
translation.ja: 仮想現実の友達か

translation.en: Ah, Miss Nerris, seeing as I'm passing, I'll just give you one of those.
translation.ja: ノリス先生ついでに配達しとくよ

translation.en: -Lovely. Thank you. -From…
translation.ja: ありがとう

translation.en: What's this?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: We brought it from the school!
translation.ja: 学校からだよ

translation.en: -Miss Nerris said we could! -Can we show Kayla and Kayan the animals?
translation.ja: あなたを元気づけるため 動物を見せても？

translation.en: -Haven't they got to get back to school? -No. Children love animals.
translation.ja: 学校は？ 子供は動物好きよ

translation.en: Like I said, Mr. Cunningham, education takes many forms.
translation.ja: 教育にはいろんな形があるの

translation.en: [Beano] Mr. C! Mr. C!
translation.ja: カニンガムさん

translation.en: Farmer Cunningham, it's Holly Goat. Her waters have broken!
translation.ja: 大変だ　ホリーが破水した

translation.en: -What? -[Beano] Quick!
translation.ja: えっ？ 急げ

translation.en: Okay, listen, I need you to call Miss Ashley, okay?

translation.en: And… Oh, get a discount.
translation.ja: これで 値引き交渉を

translation.en: I'm coming!
translation.ja: 今 行く

translation.en: Hang on!
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: Miss Ashley's on her way. Do you mind if me and the kids stay and watch?

translation.en: -This would be very educational. -Please can we see the baby goat get born?

translation.en: Stay up there, okay? Stay out the way because this is grown-up stuff.
translation.ja: 離れててこれは大人の仕事だ

translation.en: Blow out, blow in, blow out, blow in.
translation.ja: 吹き出して　吹き入れて

translation.en: You don't blow out, blow in. You breathe in, you breathe out.
translation.ja: 違う　“吸って吐いて”だ

translation.en: Breathe in, breathe out. Breathe in, breathe out.

translation.en: I can't breathe. I'm having a panic attack.

translation.en: You're hyperventilating. You need to calm down.

translation.en: No! Please! Come on, sheepy-sheep.

translation.en: -That's it. I do have somewhere to go. -[bleating]

translation.en: -Yes! -That's… Oh, God! There's a head!

translation.en: There's a head in a bubble. I can't… I'm gonna…

translation.en: No, no. You are not gonna pass out!

translation.en: This is just Mother Nature taking its course.
translation.ja: 母なる自然の営みだ

translation.en: Look, I'll just take a… Oh my God. Yeah, that is a bit weird. I'm dizzy!

translation.en: Let me help.
translation.ja: 手伝う

translation.en: Sh, it's all right. It's all right. You're doing really well. Keep pushing.

translation.en: Harder! Keep pushing! Harder! You're doing great! Harder! Keep pushing.

translation.en: -Violet, you totally smashed it! -Look at what you did!

translation.en: Look what you did.

translation.en: I got here as fast as I could. How's everything going?

translation.en: -Well, you missed the whole thing. -I wouldn't be so sure.

translation.en: What are you doing? This is no time to sleep.

translation.en: -Well done, Violet. -[Violet] Come on, Holly.

translation.en: [Miss Ashley] Ah! I'll just, uh, wrap her up in a towel.

translation.en: So cute.
translation.ja: かわいい

translation.en: -Ooh. Oh! Looks like she's pushing again. -[phone rings]

translation.en: No, now is not a good time. I can't talk.

translation.en: -Tell her I'm indisposed. -I tried, but she's insisting!

translation.en: Looks like a breech. I can find the feet. I need you to pull.

translation.en: -What? -Oh God, Miss Fletcher's calling me.

translation.en: Cunningham! Is that you?

translation.en: Hi! Miss Fletcher.

translation.en: It has come to my understanding that you're in some kind of creative retreat
translation.ja: 創作活動に集中できる落ち着いた環境に―

translation.en: so as to have no distractions, as it were. Is that right?

translation.en: That's right!
translation.ja: そうです

translation.en: -That's it! Push! I need you to pull. -[grunts]

translation.en: -Is that a woman's voice I can hear? -No, it's just a kid.

translation.en: Come on, Holly. Push.

translation.en: Children and business do not mix!

translation.en: Sorry, Miss Fletcher, you're breaking up. I have to go.

translation.en: Come on, Holly! Push! I need you to push.

translation.en: Pull.
translation.ja: がんばれ

translation.en: -That's it. -[Matt grunts, sighs]

translation.en: -We did it! -[Miss Ashley] We did it!

translation.en: Sorry. I didn't… It's just…

translation.en: -Yeah. -We made a baby!

translation.en: We made a baby! Ooh, big daddy!

translation.en: [chuckles] Look how many babies you've gone and done.

translation.en: Who's a good daddy? You're a good daddy. Who's a good daddy?

translation.en: -[bleating] -[Miss Ashley] No, she's not taking.

translation.en: I'm afraid you're going to have to hand-rear them. Take them in for a while.

translation.en: Miss Holly's exhausted.
translation.ja: ホリーは疲れてる

translation.en: Don't worry, they'll be okay.
translation.ja: 心配ない　大丈夫だ

translation.en: If you can bottle-feed them, take them to bed, cuddle them,
translation.ja: 哺乳瓶でミルクをあげて寝かせるの

translation.en: keep them warm, sing to them, things you did with your own children.
translation.ja: 自分の子にしたみたいに温かくして歌を歌う

translation.en: I didn't really do the nursing stuff.

translation.en: Well, now's your chance.

translation.en: -[goat bleats] -Okay.

translation.en: So you did really well, Miss Violet.
translation.ja: ヴァイオレット 偉いわ

translation.en: Would you like to come and help me at the surgery?

translation.en: -[gasps] Yes, please. Can I, Dad? -I don't see why not.

translation.en: I know he wants them to be in school, but seeing little Violet there in action

translation.en: makes me think farm school would be better for their confidence.

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Miss Nerris. That's what I've been trying to tell people.
translation.ja: まさに俺の言いたかったことだ

translation.en: Farm school is amazing, and Farmer Cunningham needs it more than anyone.
translation.ja: ここで一番学ぶべきはカニンガムさんだね

translation.en: And the kids, too, especially Kayla and Kayan. They've been on their own up until now.

translation.en: Don't worry, Miss Nerris. Beano's got a plan.

translation.en: We've got three baby Christmas goats.
translation.ja: ３匹の子ヤギだ

translation.en: So what about… Snowy?
translation.ja: スノーウィーは？

translation.en: -Yeah. -Yeah? Star.
translation.ja: うん スター

translation.en: -Yeah! -Do you want to name the third?
translation.ja: うん ３匹目は？

translation.en: -Yes. -[Beano] Go on, then!

translation.en: We want to name it after our mummy.
translation.ja: ママの名前にしたい

translation.en: This little dude's a boy.
translation.ja: 男の子だぞ

translation.en: We don't mind. We want to call it Sarah.
translation.ja: いいの　名前はサラ

translation.en: Welcome, Sarah,
translation.ja: サラ

translation.en: to the family.
translation.ja: ようこそ

translation.en: -Hello? -[Mo] Yo, she's after your address.
translation.ja: はい 農場の住所を知りたいそうだ

translation.en: -She wants to know where the farm is! -What?

translation.en: [Mo] Fletcher! She said she was disappointed with your FaceTime call, said you were distracted by your kids!
translation.ja: ビデオ通話で子供がジャマしてたと言ってたぞ

translation.en: Well, to be honest, it wasn't my kids. It was Holly's.
translation.ja: 僕のじゃなくホリーの子だ

translation.en: [Mo] You were supposed to go to that farm to work, to save our jobs.
translation.ja: 俺たちの職を守るため仕事してくれ

translation.en: The Banda House vultures are circling this deal, bro!
translation.ja: バンダ･ハウスにやられるぞ

translation.en: -[knocking on door] -Somebody at the door.
translation.ja: 誰か来た

translation.en: Hi, Mr. Cunningham.
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: Just thought that it'd be really nice if the children could spend time with the baby goats?
translation.ja: 子供たちを赤ちゃんヤギと過ごさせて欲しいの

translation.en: -[bleating] -Uh, what, today?
translation.ja: 今日ですか？

translation.en: Me and the villagers thought it'd be really great
translation.ja: 全員が教育に参加することがベストだと考えてる

translation.en: if everyone could take part in their education,
translation.ja: 全員が教育に参加することがベストだと考えてる 今日はあなたの番よ

translation.en: and today is your turn.
translation.ja: 今日はあなたの番よ

translation.en: I've already got five children, three kids. You want to give me two more?
translation.ja: もう５人と３匹いるのにあと２人？

translation.en: "It'd be so good for them to have children their own age to play with."

translation.en: -Isn't that what you said? -Yes. But I didn't mean--
translation.ja: 同年代の子たちと交流させたいんでしょ そうだけど…

translation.en: Okay, off you pop. Have fun!
translation.ja: いってらっしゃい農場学校を楽しんで

translation.en: -Enjoy farm school! -Right, who wants to dig up some sprouts?
translation.ja: いってらっしゃい農場学校を楽しんで 芽キャベツを収穫しよう

translation.en: Yes, come on. Follow me!
translation.ja: ついてきて

translation.en: Last one to the top of the hill has to peel them too! You too, Mr. Cunningham!
translation.ja: 最後の人は皮むきもだカニンガムさんもね

translation.en: Come on, Rudolph!
translation.ja: ルドルフ

translation.en: Come on, boy.
translation.ja: おいで

translation.en: -What's going on? -We're having sprouts for lunch.
translation.ja: 何だ 芽キャベツを

translation.en: [laughs] Good luck getting my kids to have sprou-- [Buster] Mm.
translation.ja: そんなの食べるわけ…

translation.en: Buster, where's your lollipop?
translation.ja: お前のアメは？

translation.en: I gave it to Billy Goat. I like sprouts now.
translation.ja: ヤギにあげた芽キャベツ好き

translation.en: -Do you want a sprout? -No. Absolutely not.
translation.ja: 食べる？ 遠慮するよ

translation.en: You can't hide in your study forever!
translation.ja: 書斎に隠れてちゃダメだ

translation.en: So we need to find a way to draw him out of that boring little study.
translation.ja: 書斎からパパを引っ張り出す方法を考えて

translation.en: -Any ideas? -Why don't you show Dad your tractor?
translation.ja: 書斎からパパを引っ張り出す方法を考えて トラクターは？

translation.en: Oh yeah! Even Daddy likes tractors.
translation.ja: パパもトラクターは好きだ

translation.en: Yes. Yes, I love it.
translation.ja: いい考えだ

translation.en: It's big. It's bold. It's beautiful!
translation.ja: あれは大きくて大胆で美しい

translation.en: Come on, follow me.
translation.ja: ついてきて

translation.en: Let's go!
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: -Ready? Let's go! Woo-hoo! -[exciting music plays]
translation.ja: いいか？　出発

translation.en: Innovation that we can bring to your products and your businesses.
translation.ja: 貴社のビジネスに革新を…

translation.en: -We go the extra mile. -[bleep]
translation.ja: 一層の…

translation.en: -Why is it doing that? The-- -[beeping]
translation.ja: 何だ？ 何が起きた？

translation.en: What's that?
translation.ja: 何が起きた？

translation.en: It's crashed. Oh my God. Yeah, I know. It's worse than that. Okay.
translation.ja: クラッシュした これはマズいぞ

translation.en: What else did I write? I wrote "connections."

translation.en: Oh, this is a nightmare!
translation.ja: これは悪夢だ

translation.en: What's that growing on the tree, Beano?
translation.ja: 木に生えてるのは？

translation.en: Oh, this?
translation.ja: これはヤドリギだ

translation.en: This is mistletoe. It grows all over the farm.
translation.ja: これはヤドリギだ 農場全体に育ってる名前の由来だよ

translation.en: That's where Mistletoe Farm gets its name. But our mistletoe is magic.
translation.ja: 農場全体に育ってる名前の由来だよ 俺たちのヤドリギは魔法だ

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.ja: なんで？

translation.en: Our mistletoe doesn't make people just kiss.
translation.ja: ヤドリギの下でキスするだけで

translation.en: It makes them fall in love.
translation.ja: ２人は恋に落ちる

-[kids giggle] -[Marlon] Drake! Drake!
